meanings.sent1: The unrinsed dishes were still dirty.
meanings.sent2: She left the unrinsed clothes in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent3: The unrinsed cup dripped water all over the table.
meanings.sent4: His unrinsed hair felt sticky and greasy.
meanings.sent5: The unrinsed paint left streaks on the wall.

meanings.sent2: The unrinsed shampoo made her hair feel strange.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally used the unrinsed soap and had bubbles everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The unrinsed car looked streaky after washing.
meanings.sent5: The unrinsed glass had soap residue on it.

meanings.sent1: The unrinsed mouthwash left a bitter taste.
meanings.sent2: The unrinsed bathtub had soap scum.
meanings.sent3: She realized too late that the unrinsed towel was damp.
meanings.sent4: The unrinsed floor was still soapy and slippery.
